pr_title: Add option to checkout solution repository for Haskell exercises.

timeline.message: Add option to checkout solution repository for Haskell exercises.
Remove trigger of base repository when solution repository is updated.

timeline.bodyText: does this mean the solution repo is checked out twice in the SOLUTION build plan?
timeline.author: krusche

replies.bodyText: @krusche Yes: Once as assignment and once as solution. I believe this is useful as otherwise the solution would require special tests.
replies.author: sleiss

timeline.bodyText: can we improve this test using the programming language as enum parameter so that all programming languages except Haskell are tested to produce a bad request? (this would then also include future programming languages
timeline.author: krusche

replies.bodyText: I've changed it to a @ParameterizedTest that uses all ProgrammingLanguages except HASKELL. This is also safe for the future as the test excludes HASKELL (as opposed to including all other programming languages).
replies.author: sleiss

timeline.bodyText: Can you please document the property and its default value here? thanks!
timeline.author: krusche

timeline.bodyText: please add a hint that this is only used for special cases
timeline.author: krusche
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -28,12 +28,13 @@
     /**
      * Creates the base build plan for the given programming exercise
      *
-     * @param exercise          a programming exercise with the required information to create the base build plan
-     * @param planKey           the key of the plan
-     * @param repositoryURL     the URL of the assignment repository (used to separate between exercise and solution)
-     * @param testRepositoryURL the URL of the test repository
+     * @param exercise              a programming exercise with the required information to create the base build plan
+     * @param planKey               the key of the plan
+     * @param repositoryURL         the URL of the assignment repository (used to separate between exercise and solution)
+     * @param testRepositoryURL     the URL of the test repository
+     * @param solutionRepositoryURL the URL of the solution repository

timeline.message: Use ParameterizedTest to ensure only Haskell is supported.

timeline.bodyText: Codacy found an issue: These nested if statements could be combined
timeline.author: artemis-bot
